title: A problem with the Baords Filter
body:
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/f/Ir7ZrJjF/d/jBcJ4wlw 
The link posted above goes to a meme's and games post I made as a joke. But it was removed and suggested to be moved to Concept & Creations. I would like to know why it was removed? Are you using a bot that quickly checks the post and decides if it fits based on the contents. If so I would like to ask if you could just quickly fix that when you have the time. I really just want clarification of why it was removed and how I can fix it so it won't be removed.

replies.body: It was deemed a fan art post and as such was redirected to the appropriate section.  Posts like this are part of what we were talking about when we clarified what posts are and aren't allowed in Memes & Games in this [post](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/memes/G78f7ygE-892016-update-for-clarity-regarding-allowable-topics-in-memes-games).  While your intent may have been for it to be humorous, the primary content in the post was fan art and as such it was redirected.
What did the post consist of?
It consisted of pictures of Draven in various situations with bold text proclaiming the greatness of Draven in each photo, it ending with _This gallery is sponsored by Draven._
